input.sentences: [male] had lots to do on this day .
he was driving to the mall to visit a book store and the apple store .
he arrived at the book store and bought his book .
after he headed over to the apple store to get his phone repaired .
while waiting for his phone to get fixed he headed over to the halloween shop .
output.sentences: John has lots of errands to run today.
First he needs to drive to town.
He needs to buy a book for his niece's birthday.
He also needs to see if he can get his phone repaired.
While he was waiting for the shop to fix his phone, he went to the Halloween store.
